reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress comfortable and appreciate its pretty silhouette, with one noting its loose ruffle details. The fabric feels dreamy, and customers love its color, with one describing it as a "velvety green holiday dress." The dress is perfect for both Christmas parties and winter weddings. While some it runs true to size, others mention it runs a little small. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Happy Purchase
items.body: As a gym girly with a wider frame AND a rectangular body shape--33 inch waistline--this dress will compliment you. Because of my waist measurement I did not want to go up to a size XL, since I know the dress would not fit me properly, so I risked it with a size L. Y'all. The dress fit me fabulously and has medium-stretch to it! The fabric thickness is not heavy or light, and it is not sheer nor cheap (imo, I'd say the quality is quite great). This dress can definitely be worn in late Spring through Summer to early Autumn without an outer layer added on for warmth. I am pleased and happy with this purchase and plan to order a few more in different colors. Read more
items.author: Chai_13

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality
items.body: Dress is true to size and it has stretch which allows give and comfort. I pressed it inside out to remove shipping wrinkles and it did not wrinkle with wear. I’m 5’5” and the length was like a midi. Good value for the money. The dress had good flow and was not see through so it required no slip. No pockets on this dress. Read more
items.author: I have a 16 x 80 trailer and the underpinning is what I called beige but the sand was a perfect match and fit well.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Such a great buy
items.body: This dress is absolutely beautiful. I ordered both small and medium due to the comments, and the small fit perfectly. The sleeves were the perfect length, the lower part really flowed nice. The material thickness was great, I thought i would need a coat since it was velvet fabric but I stayed warm. Read more
items.author: Amanda Warner

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress nd good fittings
items.body: The dress was very good. I havent washed it yet but looks really nice when worn. Thanks Read more
items.author: Pavitra Rao

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Festive, comfortable, classy: win!
items.body: I got this dress alongside 3 others from Gown Town so I could choose from a few for my husband's work holiday party. It was the solid winner. The color is so rich, fabric feels dreamy and high quality, and I felt really beautiful and classy. I am shy to show my arms and cleavage especially at more formal events, so this was perfect! I also tend to slump and become unaware of leaning forward in pics when alcohol flows, so this was perfect and buzzproof. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Hilary Smith

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Velvet dress
items.body: This goes over the head, runs small material wasn’t good. Read more
items.author: Shirley White

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not a winner for me
items.body: I cannot give this item a low or high score as the dress itself is well made, beautiful color but does not fit my body well at all. Going by the size chart and reviews I ordered the medium. This dress is not designed for large, out front chests and sizing up didn't help with arm hole placement and set waist placement. Again, not the fault of the dress! I'm 5'1", 114 lbs, 34DD. I am returning this one. Read more
items.author: shannon aportadera

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely dress
items.body: Loved this dress. I ordered a size small and it fit me perfectly! Perfect for my Christmas party. Read more
items.author: Charlotte

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Cocktail Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Cocktail Formal is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Velvet-black, Navy Yellow Flower, White Flower, Velvet-burgundy, Velvet-grape, Velvet-navy, Velvet-royalblue, Velvet-darkred, Velvet-darkgreen, Velvet-turquoise. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
